Articles.Content:
Growler Aerospace&Defense industry presents....

The KF-17 Project started when the bigger KF-15http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/135212-KF-15-Reaper-Fighter-%28BD-Armory%29 was found to be too big and too expensive to be used on any mission other than air superiority. So Growler Aerospace&Defense developed a smaller, single engine multi-role fighter more affordable and adaptable.

Download here: http://kerbalx.com/Growler117/KF-17-Falcon

The Falcon's standard loadout, seen here is a pair of sidewinders, a pair of AIM-120s, and four Cluster munition unit. A internal 20mm cannon with 650 rounds of ammo is also avaliable for pilots with skills and guts. All weapons are provided by BD Armory.

The four cluster bombs are devastating against soft targets, the KF-17 also retains excellent dogfighting ability after disposing those bulky bombs. This allows KF-17s to survive and escape the target zone better than dedicated attack jets or bombers.

Disclaimer: Growler Aerospace&Defense is not responsible for any loss of military/civilian life and for property destruction. All craft and weapons are tested to be acceptable quality and precision

Edited October 31, 2015 by Growler117
